xmodel.name: Government

variable.name: gov_policy_unemployment_benefit_pct
variable.description: Parameter to set the net replacement rate (the unemployment benefit as a fraction of last labour income).

variable.description: Parameter to set the fraction of the budget deficit to be financed by money financing.

variable.name: gov_policy_gdp_fraction_consumption
variable.description: Parameter to set government consumption expenditure as a fraction of GDP.

variable.name: gov_policy_gdp_fraction_investment
variable.description: Parameter to set government investment expenditure as a fraction of GDP.

variable.name: no_regions_per_gov
variable.description: Number of regions per government. Default 2.

variable.name: unemployment_benefit_pct
variable.description: Variable that sets the unemployment benefit as a fraction of last labour income.

variable.name: money_financing_fraction
variable.description: Parameter that sets the fraction of the budget deficit that is financed using money financing.

variable.name: gdp_fraction_consumption
variable.description: Parameter that sets the government consumption expenditure as a fraction of GDP.

variable.name: gdp_fraction_investment
variable.description: Parameter that sets the government investment expenditure as a fraction of GDP.

variable.name: monthly_benefit_payment
variable.description: Unemployment benefit payments for all unemployed households.

variable.name: yearly_benefit_payment
variable.description: Unemployment benefit payments for all unemployed households.

variable.name: gov_interest_rate
variable.description: Interest rate the gov uses to interest on the public debt.

variable.name: yearly_investment_expenditure
variable.description: The actual yearly government investment expenditure that is realised at the end of the year.

variable.name: yearly_consumption_expenditure
variable.description: The actual yearly government consumption expenditure that is realised at the end of the year.

variable.name: yearly_income
variable.description: The actual total government income received at the end of the year.

variable.description: The actual total government expenditure at the end of the year.

variable.description: The budget balance (deficit/surplus) that is realised at the end of the year.

variable.description: The fraction of the budget deficit that is financed by money creation.

variable.name: total_bond_financing
variable.description: The fraction of the budget deficit that is financed by government bonds.

variable.name: yearly_income_forecast
variable.description: Forecasted/planned total government income for the next year.

variable.name: yearly_expenditure_budget
variable.description: The total expenditure budget for the next year.

variable.name: budget_balance_forecast
variable.description: Forcast for the budget balance (deficit/surplus).

variable.name: monthly_consumption_expenditure
variable.description: The actual monthly government consumption expenditure that is realised at the end of the month.

variable.name: monthly_investment_expenditure

variable.name: monthly_budget_balance
variable.description: The budget balance (deficit/surplus) that is realised at the end of the month.

variable.name: monthly_consumption_budget
variable.description: The consumption budget for the next month.

variable.name: monthly_investment_budget
variable.description: The investment budget for the next month.

variable.name: monthly_income
variable.description: The actual total government income at end of month.

variable.name: monthly_expenditure
variable.description: The actual total government expenditure at end of month.

variable.name: yearly_consumption_budget
variable.description: The planned consumption budget for the next year.

variable.name: yearly_investment_budget
variable.description: The planned investment budget for the next year.
